channel.title: College on Sebastian Suchanowski
channel.description: Recent content in College on Sebastian Suchanowski

item.title: Writing the college admission essay
item.description: Let me start with a little introduction. In 2010 I was about to graduate from the Military University of Technology in Warsaw (engineer degree - sort of bachelor degree but fancier) and I decided that I will apply to a few of ivy league schools - my grades were not outstanding, my English not perfect and financially it was impossible without scholarship but I thought, what the heck, I will try anyway.
